sections.heading: Finality of partition when rule to reject or opposition unfoundedWhen the court finds that a rule to reject the partition, or an opposition to its homologation, is unfounded and that all legal formalities have been observed, it shall homologate the act of partition
sections.text: Finality of partition when rule to reject or opposition unfoundedWhen the court finds that a rule to reject the partition, or an opposition to its homologation, is unfounded and that all legal formalities have been observed, it shall homologate the act of partition.
